name: Prepare to Dine
description:
Week 3 of the prototype

The food’s alive! Can you season, flambé and blast your way through the recipes before you’re the delectable dish at the alien’s next banquet?!” 

A first-person shooter, hunting simulator where the player must run around the simulated farmland, prep and cook ingredients to make the listed recipe and feed the aliens within the time limit. 

Player must return to the Hub with collected ingredients to put it together using the button and the food assembler.
